description: To enable the installation of Copilot on enterprise devices, you need to install the September 26, 2023 Windows configuration update. This update is separate from the KB-5030310 OS build and specifically ensures that Copilot is made available. Additionally, enterprise devices require a policy to be deployed that allows them to toggle for the latest updates. Continuous innovation in Windows management can be leveraged for this purpose. For optimal management, ensure to configure Windows Update for Business (WUfB) policies accordingly.
